Summary[edit]

It is easy to put a border around this image: 
[[File:Flag of Rhode Island.svg|border|100px]]
English: Flag of Rhode Island and Providence Plantations Created by Josh Hoffer in 1912
ᏣᎳᎩ: ᎤᏍᏗ ᏧᎦᏚᏛᎢ ᎦᏓᏘ
Español: Bandera de Rhode Island y plantaciones de Providence
Français : Drapeau du Rhode Island et plantations de Providence
Français cadien: Flag du Rhode Island et plantations de Providence
Hawaiʻi: Ka hae Loke ‘Ailana
Latina: Vexillum Rhodensis Insulae
Nedersaksies: Vlagge van Rhode Island en Providence Plantagen
Nederlands: Vlag van Rhode Island and Providence Plantations
Diné bizaad: Wóód Áalin Hahoodzo bidáh naat'á'i'
Deitsch: Faahne vun Rhode Island
Русский: Флаг Род-Айленда
Српски / srpski: Zastava američke savezne države Rhode Island

from the xrmap flag collection 2.7

Licensing[edit]

 This image from the Xrmap flag collection (source: flags-2.6-src.tar.bz2).
The README file in that collection says of the SVG flags "We release them in the public domain".
Public domainPublic domainfalsefalse
This work has been released into the public domain by its copyright holder, Xrmap. This applies worldwide.
In some countries this may not be legally possible; if so:
Xrmap grants anyone the right to use this work for any purpose, without any conditions, unless such conditions are required by law.

Public domainPublic domainfalsefalse

This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.
